name: Chicken Biryani
desc: A flavorful South Indian dish made with aromatic spices, basmati rice, and marinated chicken.

name: Masala Dosa
desc: A crispy fermented crepe filled with spiced potatoes, onions, and chutneys.

name: Palak Paneer
desc: A creamy spinach curry made with paneer (Indian cheese), spinach puree, and spices.

name: Idli
desc: Steamed rice cakes made from fermented batter, often served with sambar and chutney.

name: Tandoori Chicken
desc: Marinated chicken cooked in a clay oven (tandoor) with yogurt and spices.

name: Samosas
desc: Crunchy fried or baked pastries filled with spiced potatoes, peas, and onions.

name: Rajma Masala
desc: A spicy kidney bean curry made with onions, garlic, ginger, and tomatoes.

name: Lassi
desc: A yogurt-based drink blended with spices, milk, and sugar.

name: Mattar Paneer
desc: A creamy pea and paneer curry made with onions, garlic, and spices.

name: Gulab Jamun
desc: Deep-fried dumplings soaked in a sweet rose syrup and cardamom.
